product_name: Wasatch Powder Monkeys 594XT Sidearm Adapter Kit
long_description: The Wasatch Powder Monkeys 594XT Sidearm Adapter Kit makes your Thule 594XT Sidearm Universal Upright Bike Mount compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately). The adapter kit attaches to your Thule Sidearm so you can easily slide it on and off the Switchblade Crossbars in seconds without tools. Aluminum components are machined for precision and feature anodizing for strength and durability. Stainless-steel fasteners and tough nylon provide long-term durability, light weight, and a high strength-to-weight ratio. Kit also works with the SmartStorage Wall Storage Unit (sold separately), so you can securely mount your Sidearm in the garage when not in use.
short_description: The Wasatch Powder Monkeys 594XT Sidearm Adapter Kit makes your Thule 594XT Sidearm Universal Upright Bike Mount compatible with the Wasatch Powder Monkeys Switchblade Crossbars (sold separately).
